14 void ConstrainedRigidMotion::init()
15 {
16  this->locking_=ConstrainedRigidMotion::createDiffDriveLocking();
17 
18  this->state_in_=Eigen::Vector3d::Zero();
19  this->d_state_in_=Eigen::Vector3d::Zero();
20 
21  this->angular_tensor_=Eigen::Matrix3d::Zero();
22  this->rotation_=Eigen::Quaterniond::Identity();
23  this->constrain_=Eigen::Vector3d::Zero();
24  this->d_constrain_=Eigen::Vector3d::Zero();
25 
26  this->state_out_=this->state_in_;
27  this->d_state_out_=this->d_state_in_;
28 
29  this->time_old_=0.0;
30  this->time_new_=this->time_old_;
31  this->initial_call_=true;
32 }
33 void ConstrainedRigidMotion::setReference(Eigen::Vector3d ref)
34 {
35  this->reference_=ref;
36 }
37 void ConstrainedRigidMotion::setVelocityThresh(double thresh)
38 {
39  this->velocity_constrain_thresh_=thresh;
40 }
41 void ConstrainedRigidMotion::updateInputState(Eigen::Vector3d state,Eigen::Vector3d d_state,double time)
42 {
43 
44  this->time_new_=time;
45  this->state_in_=state;
46  this->d_state_in_=d_state;
47  this->rotation_=Eigen::AngleAxisd(0.0, Eigen::Vector3d::UnitX())
48  * Eigen::AngleAxisd(0.0, Eigen::Vector3d::UnitY())
49  * Eigen::AngleAxisd(state(2), Eigen::Vector3d::UnitZ());
50 
51  this->angular_tensor_(0,1)=-this->d_state_in_(2);
52  this->angular_tensor_(1,0)=this->d_state_in_(2);
53 
54  calcUnConstrained();
55  calcConstrains();
56  applyConstrains();
57  this->initial_call_=false;
58 }
59 Eigen::Vector3d ConstrainedRigidMotion::getState()
60 {
61  return this->state_out_;
62 }
63 Eigen::Vector3d ConstrainedRigidMotion::getDiffState()
64 {
65  return this->d_state_out_;
66 }
67 
68 void ConstrainedRigidMotion::calcConstrains()
69 {
70  Eigen::Vector3d constrain_old=this->constrain_;
71  double d_time=(this->time_new_-this->time_old_);
72  if(d_time>0.0 &&!this->initial_call_)
73  {
74  if(std::sqrt(std::pow(this->d_state_out_(0),2)+std::pow(this->d_state_out_(1),2))>this->velocity_constrain_thresh_)
75  {
76  this->constrain_<<0.0,0.0,std::atan2(this->d_state_out_(1),this->d_state_out_(0));
77  }
78  else
79  {
80  this->constrain_<<0.0,0.0,this->state_in_(2)+this->reference_(2);
81  }
82 
83  this->d_constrain_=(this->constrain_-constrain_old)/d_time;
84  }
85  this->time_old_=this->time_new_;
86 }
87 
88 void ConstrainedRigidMotion::calcUnConstrained()
89 {
90  //Rotate the reference position
91  Eigen::Vector3d rot_ref=this->rotation_*Eigen::Vector3d(this->reference_(0),this->reference_(1),0.0);
92  this->state_out_=this->state_in_+rot_ref;
93  //Add the reference angle
94  this->state_out_(2)=this->state_in_(2)+this->reference_(2);
95  //rotate the velocities
96  this->d_state_out_=(this->d_state_in_+this->rotation_*this->angular_tensor_*this->reference_);
97 
98 }
99 
100 void ConstrainedRigidMotion::applyConstrains()
101 {
102  this->state_out_=this->locking_*this->state_out_+this->constrain_;
103  this->d_state_out_=this->locking_*this->d_state_out_+this->d_constrain_;
104 
105 }
106 
107 Eigen::Matrix3d ConstrainedRigidMotion::createDiffDriveLocking()
108 {
109  Eigen::Matrix3d locking;
110  locking=Eigen::Matrix3d::Identity();
111  locking(2,2)=0.0;
112  return locking;
113 }
